SHO:19.title: Alphabet Stories
SHO:19.description: Alphabet Stories showcases a variety of words that start with each letter of the alphabet. After the introduction of each letter, a fun story is told that encompasses all the words into one wild, wacky and imaginative tale.

SHO:20.title: Annedroids
SHO:20.description: 11-year-old genius and kid-scientist Anne has invented and built her own amazing androids. When these curious and complicated robots cause havoc, Anne’s friends Nick and Shania figure out simple solutions to Anne’s scientific problems.

SHO:21.title: Astroblast!
SHO:21.description: Race through the stars on an intergalactic surfboard! Or work on a puzzle with Comet and Sputnik back at the Astroblast Space Station. There’s always something to do at the coolest hangout in the galaxy.

SHO:22.title: Big Bear and Squeak
SHO:22.description: Is it a dolphin? Could it be a gorilla? Hmm... is that brown thing a hoof or a paw? Guess which animal Squeak the mouse is pointing to in Big Bear's Amazing Animal Book. Hanging out with these two is like going to the zoo!

SHO:23.title: Boj
SHO:23.description: Meet Boj, a burrowing bilby from the Australian Outback. Boj loves to help his neighbours in Giggly Park and solve problems with the help of his friends.

SHO:24.title: Can You Imagine That!
SHO:24.description: What do you want to be when you grow up? You can be anything  when you use your imagination!

SHO:25.title: Creative Galaxy
SHO:25.description: Follow the adventures of Arty and his sidekick Epiphany as they search the galaxy to solve creative problems with art!

SHO:26.title: Dino Dan: Trek's Adventures
SHO:26.description: Join paleontologist-in-training Dan Henderson as he takes kids on a Jurassic journey to the land where lizards were as long as three school buses and terrifying Tyrannosaurus ruled.

SHO:27.title: Dinosaur Train
SHO:27.description: Take a wild train ride through history with Buddy the Tyrannosaurus and his adopted Pteranadon mother. Buddy learns about many cool dinosaur species – including his own!

SHO:29.title: Doggy Day School
SHO:29.description: Doggy Day School is the home away from home for a lovable crew of dogs – Suki, Lili, Pedro, Koda and Lucas. The dogs play, learn about each other and the world around them, and get into – and out of – merry mischief.

SHO:30.title: Doki
SHO:30.description: Sling on your expedition pack and climb aboard the vintage float plane. Whether you’re flying to China or Brazil, you know you’re bound to learn something new and have an adventure with Team Doki.

SHO:31.title: Doozers
SHO:31.description: Doozers, based on the popular Fraggle Rock series, is about a team of four best friends who play and learn together.  Join Spike, Molly Bolt, Flex and Daisy Wheel as they bounce from one fabulous adventure to another.

SHO:32.title: Dragon
SHO:32.description: Dragon giggles his way through life. No matter what happens, this jolly hero’s glass is always half full. Join Dragon and his wonderful team of friends as they explore their special imaginary world!

SHO:33.title: Ella the Elephant
SHO:33.description: Welcome to the Elephant Islands, home of Ella, a spirited little girl with a big heart, bigger imagination and a magic hat that can transform into almost anything.

SHO:34.title: Finding Stuff Out
SHO:34.description: Finding Stuff Out gives kids answers to questions that matter most to them! Hosted by Harrison, each fun and exciting episode answers questions from real kids, such as “Do plants think?” and “Why do we have to eat?”wondered about and laugh your head off too.

SHO:38.title: Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs
SHO:38.description: One… two… three… JUMP with Harrry into his magical bucket full of dinosaurs! With his dino pals, Harry bounces down Pillow Mountain, sails around Soda Fountain Valley and hops on jelly doughnut stepping-stones in a new adventure every day.

SHO:39.title: Hi Opie!
SHO:39.description: Opie heads to Kindergarten where he can’t wait to make new friends and figure out all the new things there are to learn and discover.

SHO:41.title: The Hive
SHO:41.description: Pappa Bee, Mamma Bee, Buzzbee and Babee are just like any other family, except they're tiny, stripy and can fly!

SHO:43.title: I'm a Creepy Crawly
SHO:43.description: Which bug can take its own legs off? Which one can survive a month without food? And which one eats using 25,000 teeth? Scurry under foot with the crunchy and the slimy and learn a thing or two.

SHO:44.title: I'm a Monster
SHO:44.description: Meet a talkative troll, a shy yeti, a gentleman vampire and a misunderstood bogeyman as they – and a host of other monsters – introduce us to their world.

SHO:45.title: Jack
SHO:45.description: Jack, a small blue-skinned alien, lands his rocket ship in nine-year-old Nico’s backyard! Nico can’t believe it, and agrees to keep Jack a secret. Together, these two new friends learn about life, earth and especially, themselves.

SHO:46.title: Jelly Jamm
SHO:46.description: Life is a song on planet Jammbo where you can jump in flying bathtubs and run around in magic sneakers. One song at a time, Bello and his friends learn to live in harmony with the plants and creatures in their magical world.

SHO:49.title: Kate and Mim-Mim
SHO:49.description: Twirl away to Mimiloo! Chase wild critters with Mim-Mim, a giant plush bunny who comes to life to go on adventures with his best friend Kate, a curious little girl with a big imagination.

SHO:51.title: Lah - Lah's Adventures
SHO:51.description: Jam with Lah-Lah and her big live band in a place where anything is possible and music is everywhere! Open the cupboard of secret sounds, dance with the double bass, and watch out for that silly sneezing accordion.

SHO:52.title: Learn to Draw ABC
SHO:52.description: Start your drawing adventure with Doodle and his friend Øistein! Use all the pencil crayons in your box to bring the alphabet to life. Imagine A as a hairy ape or E as a crazy elk. Are you ready for some fun?

SHO:53.title: Learn to Draw Minis
SHO:53.description: Start your drawing adventure with Doodle and his friend Øistein! Use all the pencil crayons in your box to create cool cartoons from start to finish. You can make a policeman, a donkey or even a stinky manure truck!

SHO:55.title: The Little Prince
SHO:55.description: The Little Prince leaves his asteroid home to explore the universe. Joined by his friend the fox, the Little Prince visits many different planets, meets new friends and helps finds solutions to problems.

SHO:58.title: Making Stuff
SHO:58.description: Making spaghetti is way more fun – and delicious – when you’re with Gears, the chatty machine. Same goes for piecing together a bicycle and learning how a squirt gun works. Who knew machines were so fun?

SHO:59.title: Marco Polo
SHO:59.description: Set out on a wild adventure with young Marco Polo as he searches for his missing father. Travelling east, Marco and his friends, Luigi and Shi La Won, meet greedy pirates, great kings and whole villages of new and interesting friends.

SHO:60.title: Martha Speaks
SHO:60.description: What if your dog could talk? Follow the adventures of Martha after alphabet soup gives her the power of speech. She gets jobs, foils bad guys, wins contests and orders lots of steak!

SHO:61.title: Maya the Bee
SHO:61.description: A young bee named Maya has left her hive to discover the beauty and mysteries of nature. As she explores the meadow where she lives, she meets other insects living there, plays to her heart’s content and shares her joy with her friends.

SHO:64.title: Mister Maker
SHO:64.description: Let’s make it! Couches made of clay and tables made of straws – bring your imagination to life with Mister Maker. Inside his big colourful studio, you can turn the simplest things into awesome little artworks.

SHO:65.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
SHO:65.description: Monkey invites you to discover, copy and dance along with the featured animal guest.

SHO:66.title: The Mysteries of Alfred Hedgehog
SHO:66.description: In Gnarly Woods almost anything can happen. Fish rain from the sky, green eyes glow in the dark, and trees turn blue. The eerie, curious and very mysterious all seem to thrive here, and everyone turns to Alfred Hedgehog to figure things out. Join Alfred, his buddies Camille and Milo on solving puzzles and problems of Alfred's mysterious world.

SHO:67.title: Nico Can Dance
SHO:67.description: Nico and Miss Frost create fantastical worlds by dancing and using their imaginations and discover that amazing things happen when you move.

SHO:70.title: Paw Patrol
SHO:70.description: Trouble in town? Need an extra hand – or paw?! No worries, Ryder and his PAW Patrol Pups are on the way!  Ten-year-old RYDER and his “can-do” PUP friends are always ready to help.

SHO:72.title: Rob the Robot
SHO:72.description: Rob is the galaxy's most curious and adventurous robot. He explores fantastic planets with his friends Ema, TK, and Orbit! Rob knows he can count on his friends, and their trusty toolkit, to help solve problems and make it back home in one piece.

SHO:74.title: Shaun the Sheep
SHO:74.description: Follow the flock? Not this sheep. Shaun loves leading his friends into mischief, running circles around Bitzer the sheepdog and leaving the balding and bespectacled farmer to scratch his head and wonder.

SHO:76.title: Tattle Tails
SHO:76.description: Explore the secret and hilarious lives of animals in Canada’s forests, rivers, zoos and wildlife rehabs. Learn what animals think about things like the weather – and those funny, two-legged humans.

SHO:80.title: Tumble Leaf
SHO:80.description: A blue fox names Fig and his friends go on adventures and learn how things work in the world.

SHO:81.title: The Upside Down Show
SHO:81.description: David and Shane are brothers who live in the craziest house ever! Their home has more doors than walls, and you never know what you'll find. The brothers visit many new worlds, but they need help from viewers at home. Also coming on their adventures are their friends Puppet, Fido and The Schmuzzies.

SHO:82.title: Wild Kratts
SHO:82.description: Join Chris and Martin as they use their creative powers to learn about the secret lives of extraordinary animals and rescue them from exploitation.

SHO:83.title: Word World
SHO:83.description: Join Duck, Frog and their animal buddies as they build words – and funny adventures – letter by letter. In a colourful world, problems are solved by playing and building together.

SHO:84.title: YOUniverse
SHO:84.description: If YOU had your own planet what would it look like? Would it be green, purple or blue? Would it be filled with huge furry buildings or covered in gumdrop trees? Are the people small, tall or there at all?

SHO:85.title: Zerby Derby
SHO:85.description: Zerby Derby is a fully live-action series, where toy-sized, remote-controlled cars live and play in a life-size forest. Whether it's crossing streams, building dams or exploring a meadow, the Zerbies approach every problem with enthusiasm, and when things go wrong, they happily tackle each set-back with their mantra: "try, try again."

SHO:86.title: Knowledge Kids
SHO:86.description: Every day, Luna, Chip and Inkie find new places to explore and things to do. There's so much to see and discover! Hang out with these three best friends and you'll be amazed at what you learn. It wouldn't be an adventure without you!

SHO:102.title: Shaun the Sheep: The Farmer's Llamas
SHO:102.description: When a mix-up at the auction leads to a surprise win, the Farmer brings his prize animals - a trio of llamas - home to the farm. Shaun is thrilled, but are the new residents a baaad influence?

SHO:166.title: The Day Henry Met...?
SHO:166.description: Everyday Henry meets something new – The day Henry met a Whale!, The day Henry met the Moon!, The day Henry met a Car! How exciting, I wonder what Henry’s going to meet today?

SHO:167.title: Ruff - Ruff Tweet and Dave
SHO:167.description: Join Ruff Ruff, Tweet and Dave, and their friend Hatty on fun-filled adventures in fantastical lands.

SHO:222.title: Floogals
SHO:222.description: On their mission to Earth, tiny alien space explorers Fleeker, Flo, and Boomer arrive at their unique – and often comical – conclusions about everyday objects in the giant "hooman" world.

SHO:257.title: Mofy
SHO:257.description: Mofy is a sweet and caring bunny who lives on a cotton ball. In her daily experiences, Mofy learns to understand and deal with different emotions as she grows in confidence with a positive attitude.

SHO:290.title: Box Yourself Minis
SHO:290.description: Grab your toilet rolls, egg boxes, or drink cartons to follow creativity guru Øistein as he uses simple craft techniques to upcycle cardboard and paper into toothpick hedgehogs and even cow backpacks!

SHO:291.title: Molang
SHO:291.description: Molang, a round fluffy white rabbit, and friend Piu Piu go on fun and quirky adventures that will leave you giggling as much as they do!

SHO:297.title: Ginalina's Music Club
SHO:297.description: Honeybees and sweet harmonies... nature is so exciting! Explore the fascinating outdoors with Ginalina. Look for shapes, buzz around the hive, and bop along with a dancing tree!

SHO:299.title: Ready Jet Go!
SHO:299.description: Zip past Mars and twist around the rings of Saturn as Jet, Sydney, and Sean race through our solar system learning about our little neighbourhood in the Milky Way Galaxy.

SHO:310.title: Timmy Time
SHO:310.description: From the creators of Shaun the Sheep comes Timmy Time! The little lamb with a lot to learn gets help from his furry, feathery, and spikey friends at Nursery.

SHO:341.title: Digby Dragon
SHO:341.description: Fun and lovable adventures abound in Applecross Wood, where Digby Dragon is just starting to learn to fly with the help of his forest friends.

SHO:342.title: Jerry and the Raiders
SHO:342.description: Go on a mission to uncover life’s little mysteries with Jerry, Bakko, and Gant. Remember, things are not always as they appear to be and simple everyday things always turn out to be amazing!

SHO:343.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small
SHO:343.description: Miffy, the sweet little bunny-rabbit, discovers the simple things in this world with her friends in this new take on the classic book series.

SHO:344.title: Shutterbugs
SHO:344.description: Follow Flick the Firefly, an investigative reporter for the Murky Muse newspaper, his pals Horace the horsefly and Opal the orb webbed spider, as they help shed light on first time experiences.

SHO:391.title: Sweet Tweets
SHO:391.description: Get whisked away with Momma Tweet, Poppa Sweet and their family full of Tweetle Bums, to a whimsical world bursting with wonderful stories and incredibly catchy songs.

SHO:393.title: Splash and Bubbles
SHO:393.description: Dive into the wonders of the ocean as Splash, Bubbles, and their fin-tastic friends go on adventures to meet "citizens of the sea" – sometimes with musical flair!

SHO:427.title: Kit 'n' Kate
SHO:427.description: Let your imagination transform the littlest things into the biggest adventures with two small kittens named Kit and Kate.

SHO:439.title: Paper Tales
SHO:439.description: When you live in a paper world anything can be created with scissors and glue. Aristotle the moose and Knock-Knock the woodpecker will teach you how!

SHO:472.title: Giver 150
SHO:472.description: Join Canada's 150th birthday celebrations as Giver Kids build a world record-breaking playground in the heart of the nation's capital, Ottawa.

SHO:590.title: Canada Crew
SHO:590.description: Bebe the Beaver, Mo the Moose, and Gavin the Canada goose take a playful cross-Canada tour sharing adventures, incredible sights and fun facts from our beloved nation.

SHO:596.title: Dino Dana
SHO:596.description: Dana's life changes forever when she is given the Dino Field Guide and gains the power to imagine dinosaurs into real life.

SHO:600.title: Best Sports Ever
SHO:600.description: Budding sport journalist, Theo, sets out to learn about as many sports as he can.

SHO:605.title: Peep and the Big Wide World
SHO:605.description: Peep, Chirp, and Quack give wings to the idea that pre-schoolers can learn science and math through daily adventures in the park.

SHO:608.title: Pinky Dinky Doo
SHO:608.description: Seven-year-old Pinky has a wild imagination, and loves to make up tall tales to help her younger brother, Tyler Doo.

SHO:785.title: The Ollie & Moon Show
SHO:785.description: Ollie and Moon are six-year-old cats who have a knack for spinning everyday preschool life into zany globetrotting adventure.

SHO:788.title: Opie's Home
SHO:788.description: A family comedy told from the four year-old point of view.

SHO:812.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps
SHO:812.description: Follow the adventures of a remarkable little mouse who dreams of becoming a prima ballerina.

SHO:881.title: Belle and Sebastian
SHO:881.description: Follow the adventures of Belle and Sebastian. They have a friendship that can move mountains.

SHO:884.title: Arthur
SHO:884.description: Hang out with your favourite aardvark as he learns about the many colourful people in our world.

SHO:938.title: Kid - E - Cats
SHO:938.description: Little kittens Cookie, Pudding and Candy are learning to look before they leap with their boundless imagination.

SHO:1085.title: P King Duckling
SHO:1085.description: Take a stroll through Hilly Hole with this young duck and his best friends Wombat and Chumpkins as they find wild and wacky ways to solve their problems.

SHO:1123.title: I'm a Fish
SHO:1123.description: Dive in with a variety of underwater creatures as tell you about their lives under the sea.

SHO:1270.title: Helen's Little School
SHO:1270.description: Five year-old Helen dreams of being a teacher, so she's decided to start her own school. The only school for toys!

SHO:1404.title: Genius Genie
SHO:1404.description: Whatever the problem, Lili, Leo, Penelope, and Genie are always ready to help - and have fun, of course!

SHO:1407.title: Frankie and Frank
SHO:1407.description: One is a big monster, the other a little boy. But they are best buds and always have loads of fun with sweet surprises and lots of learning.

SHO:1410.title: Tee and Mo
SHO:1410.description: This is the story of a new monkey mum, Mo, and her 3-year old boy, Tee. And, how they navigate their daily life around the jungle tree.

SHO:1416.title: Trulli Tales
SHO:1416.description: In Trulliland, the ancient arts of magic and cooking blend into one. Four friends have been chosen to protect the town's most prized possession, a Magic Cookbook, from the hands of Copperpot.

SHO:1419.title: Kiva Can Do!
SHO:1419.description: Kiva's imagination knows no bounds. She can create absolutely anything and go absolutely anywhere. Whatever she can dream - Kiva Can Do!

SHO:1422.title: Mister Rabbit
SHO:1422.description: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Or in the case of Mister Rabbit, get some help from Little Rabbit.

SHO:1425.title: Ella, Oscar and Hoo
SHO:1425.description: Whether you have your head in the clouds or feet on the ground, the world is open for wondrous exploration with Ella, Oscar, and Hoo.

SHO:1479.title: Animanimals
SHO:1479.description: Sometimes animals have unique problems that can only happen to them - like a sloth being too slow to eat ice cream. And in finding a solution, each animal learns a little lesson about life.

SHO:1599.title: The New Adventures of Geronimo Stilton
SHO:1599.description: Geronimo Stilton is the Editor-in-Chief of the most famouse newspaper in New Mouse City, the Rodent's Gazette. He searches the city for new scoops while having adventures along the way.

SHO:1614.title: Finding Stuff Out With Zoey
SHO:1614.description: No question is too weird, no experiment too crazy! Ten-year-old host Zoey does it all, answering questions from real kids while having a blast with cool songs, skits, and expert advice. Find the answers to questions you've always wondered about, and then some!

PLA:157.title: Christmas Specials
PLA:157.description: Celebrate Christmas with all your favourite Knowledge Kids shows, all gathered in one place, and wrapped up with a bow. Available throughout December.
